trans-unit.source: Configuring security for <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>

seg-source.mrk: Configuring security for <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>

target.mrk: Configuring security for <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>

trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> can be deployed in a number of ways and in a number of different environments, ranging from a single-user deployment for small-scale development and testing to a multi-user deployment of a large database. For all but the smallest deployments, however, it is essential to make the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system secure.

seg-source.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> can be deployed in a number of ways and in a number of different environments, ranging from a single-user deployment for small-scale development and testing to a multi-user deployment of a large database.
For all but the smallest deployments, however, it is essential to make the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system secure.

target.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> can be deployed in a number of ways and in a number of different environments, ranging from a single-user deployment for small-scale development and testing to a multi-user deployment of a large database.
For all but the smallest deployments, however, it is essential to make the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system secure.

trans-unit.source: To secure a <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database or databases, take the following steps.

target.mrk: To secure a <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database or databases, take the following steps.

trans-unit.source: Understand the concept of identity in <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

trans-unit.source: Understand the basic tasks involved in configuring security in a client-server environment or an embedded environment.

trans-unit.source: Configure authentication by setting up users and passwords.

seg-source.mrk: Configure authentication by setting up users and passwords.

target.mrk: Configure authentication by setting up users and passwords.

trans-unit.source: Authentication determines whether someone is a legal user. It establishes a user's identity. <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> verifies user names and passwords before permitting access to the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system.

seg-source.mrk: Authentication determines whether someone is a legal user.
It establishes a user's identity.
<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> verifies user names and passwords before permitting access to the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system.

target.mrk: Authentication determines whether someone is a legal user.
It establishes a user's identity.
<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> verifies user names and passwords before permitting access to the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system.

trans-unit.source: Configure user authorization for the system.

seg-source.mrk: Configure user authorization for the system.

target.mrk: Configure user authorization for the system.

trans-unit.source: Authorization determines what operations can be performed by a user's <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> identity. Authorization grants users or roles permission to read a database or to write to a database.

seg-source.mrk: Authorization determines what operations can be performed by a user's <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> identity.
Authorization grants users or roles permission to read a database or to write to a database.

target.mrk: Authorization determines what operations can be performed by a user's <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> identity.
Authorization grants users or roles permission to read a database or to write to a database.

trans-unit.source: For more information about authorization, see <xref href="cdevcsecure36595.dita#cdevcsecure36595"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The section "Derby Network Server advanced topics" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citadmin"></ph> has more information on security issues. The <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph> describes many security-related properties and system procedures, as well as such statements as GRANT, REVOKE, CREATE ROLE, DROP ROLE, CREATE PROCEDURE, and CREATE FUNCTION.

target.mrk: The section "Derby Network Server advanced topics" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citadmin"></ph> has more information on security issues.

The <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph> describes many security-related properties and system procedures, as well as such statements as GRANT, REVOKE, CREATE ROLE, DROP ROLE, CREATE PROCEDURE, and CREATE FUNCTION.
